config.name: Offline Payment
config.author: JoomlaXi.com
config.description:
This app is beneficial to use when its user wants to perform transactions via either of these modes:-
+ Payment by cheque
+ Payment by demand draft
+ Payment by cash

Reference Link:Offline Pay
config.help:
For Executing Recurring subscriptions with Offline Payment App,
Option 1. User is required to maintain amount in his wallet (using wallet recharge), so that future recurring payments will be deducted from his wallet automatically.
Option 2. User will continue paying in the bank account for recurring subscription and admin will create an equivalent transaction in PayPlans everytime when payment is successfully received by admin.

You can opt any one from the above options.
You can set Pre-Expiry email so as to notify your users for further payment.
